verbs.description: heat [V: may] be responsible for phoenix woman car window shattering a valley driver found out in a hard way that the valley summer heat can take a toll on car windows and even the tiniest chip or crack can spell disaster fox 10 matt galka reports michelle donati window jasmine berthold
